model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
I am thinking about getting a new tattoo for my mom to match the one for my dad. What do you think?
That sounds like a great way to honor your parents. I don't have any tattoos myself, but I've thought about it. Maybe the names of my wife or sons
That is a great idea.  I would also add their birth dates as well.  You should take time to think about what font you would want to use.
I am a little scared of needles though. Were your tattoos painful?
Most of them were not.  It really depends on where on your body you get them.  Most of mine are on areas that didn't hurt.  The one on my foot and the one behind my ear did hurt a good bit.  Where were you thinking about getting it?
I hadn't really thought about it! Maybe upper arm or upper back? But I'm no tattoo expert. And I'd have to get permission from my wife first, LOL
Definitely talk to her first.  I had a friend that didn't talk to his wife and just came home with a tattoo one day.  It led to a huge fight - both about the money he spent and not discussing it with her.  He slept on my couch for over a week!
Oh no! Yeah, you don't want to spring something like that on your spouse. I don't think you mentioned before, are you married?
No.  I haven't found anyone that could deal with me or that I could deal with for more than a few months.  At this point, I have given up on the idea of getting married and want to focus on my artwork.
There's nothing wrong with being on your own. You've got to focus on meeting your own needs first. Have you done any interesting art/graffiti lately?

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'Introduction and Hobbies', 'Related Summaries': 'Speaker A and Speaker B introduce themselves and discuss their hobbies.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Speaker A: Hello, how are you doing today. ### Speaker B: Great! Tell me about yourself. I'm married with two boys. Grew up in san francisco. ### Speaker A: I love the show friends and enjoy visiting graffiti-filled places. ### Speaker B: Different! I have to travel a lot for my job. ### Speaker A: I work at the coffee shop my mom owned. ### Speaker B: Do they sell fries, they're my favorite! ### Speaker A: No fries, yet lol fries are good though! ### Speaker B: Do you have any hobbies? I'm an avid fisherman. ### Speaker A: I enjoy getting tattoos. I have 5so far.' }(2) {'Related Topics': 'Tattoos and Fishing Trip to Michigan', 'Related Summaries': 'Speaker A talks about tattoos while Speaker B shares about a recent fishing trip to Michigan.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Speaker B: Wow! That's a lot. Any favorites? ### Speaker A: The one that I got for my dad passing is probably my favorite. ### Speaker B: That's so nice. What is it? ### Speaker A: It says "for you I shall live". ### Speaker B: I love that. What a wonderful reminder of what I am sure was a wonderful man. ### Speaker A: Tell me have you been travelling with work to any interesting places? ### Speaker B: I was just in Michigan!  I was able to sneak away for a bit and get some fishing in caught a muskie ### Speaker A: I've never been to Michigan before. What type of fish is a muskie? Did you eat the muskie? ### Speaker B: the one I caught was about 30 pounds.  They have a mouth full of teeth.  Not really a tasty fish but they look mean' }(3) {'Related Topics': 'Vacation Plans and Next Tattoo', 'Related Summaries': 'Speaker A discusses vacation plans and saving up for the next tattoo.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Speaker A: That's great that you got a break and were able to pursue your personal interests for a day. I really could use a vacation from working at the coffee shop. However, I'm working double-shifts and overtime to save up for my next tattoo. ### Speaker B: thats cool.  What are you looking at getting next? ### Speaker A: I plan to get a portrait of my father's face next to the slogan I had tattooed on my chest in his memory.' }
```
